thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Vietnam Arrests Former Officials, Police Linked to Property Tycoon

author: wsjcom
title: Vietnam Arrests Former Officials, Police Linked to Property Tycoon
text:
HANOIâ€”Vietnamese police have arrested or placed under house arrest several former officials and police officers with alleged ties to a detained real-estate developer as communist authorities crackdown on graft.
Police officially launched an investigation and issued arrest warrants for a former mayor of the central coastal city of Da Nang and two former senior police officers, the Ministry of Public Security said on its website late Tuesday.
...
